title: How do I recover a account when it got hacked from a scam?
body: How do I recover a account when it got hacked from a scam?

replies.body:
Not unless you have access to the account and the email address associated with it.

Is contacting support not something you can do?

Hey there,

Sorry to hear your account was compromised, to recover a compromised account you'll need to go through the [account recovery process](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account).

Assuming you don't have access to the compromised account to change the password/email address associated you can skip straight to [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154)

>[Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154) with the subject line "Unrecoverable Account" from the email address that you used to sign up for your account. Make sure to provide us with the requested information about the account you are trying to recover. From there we will work with you to verify ownership of the account.
